name: SpeakUpAfrica
goal:
We are a policy and advocacy action tank dedicated to catalyzing leadership, enabling policy change, and increasing awareness for sustainable development in Africa.
Through our platforms and relationships, and with the help of our partners, we ensure that policy makers meet implementers; that solutions are showcased and that every sector contributes critically to the dialogue and strives to form the blueprints for concrete action for sustainable development â€“ from individual citizens and civil society groups to global donors and business leaders.
interests: International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Implementing the 2030 agenda
European consensus on development
Africa-Europe Alliance
External investment plan
Multi-annual financial framework
Policy coherence for development
EU-WHO-UHC agreement
